original_text: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.
korean_text: 그가 배를 불리려 할 때에 하나님이 맹렬한 진노를 내리시리니 음식을 먹을 때에 그의 위에 비 같이 쏟으시리라

sentences.original_text: When he is about to fill his belly
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 배를 채우려 할 때

sentences.original_text: God shall cast fury of his wrath upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그에게 진노의 분노를 쏟으실 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall rain it upon him
